definition: lit. the man has gold under his knees; fig. a man who does not easily kneel in front of others (owing to pride or moral integrity)
pinyin: nan2 ren2 xi1 xia4 you3 huang2 jin1

definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
